title: Fully Prepared
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Uwa~~! There are lots of chocolates~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Even during weekdays it’s really crowded, as expected of chocolate stores….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Is that so? Last year, I came on the 13th and it was a loooot more crowded. Really! To the point where I couldn’t even walk!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I see<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>What’s more, all of the chocolates look so delicious, I couldn’t decide which to buy! So I thought today I’ll consult with Dia-san and pick one~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Leave it to me….or so I would like to say, we should’ve done more research for something like this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Listen well, Honoka-san. Whatever it may be, going fully prepared is important. Next year, we shall find out which shops are at the places we’re going to<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ah! That chocolate looks delicious! Dia-san, let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Wait, Honoka-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
